FUMBLE-NATURAL-2-TEXT: You can attack no other target for 1d4 rounds (or until the target is dead).
FUMBLE-NATURAL-3-TEXT: You take a -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-8-TEXT: You take 1d4 points of slashing damage and a -2 penalty on attack rolls with that attack for 1d4 rounds.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-9-TEXT: You kick up dust that %STATUS-BLINDED=blinds% you for 1d4 rounds (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Dex saving throw negates%).
FUMBLE-NATURAL-10-TEXT: You take 1d6 points of damage + your Str modifier.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-11-TEXT: You take 1 point of %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Con saving throw negates%).
FUMBLE-NATURAL-12-TEXT: Your attack hits the target but the target may start a grapple against you for free.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-13-TEXT: You can only take a move next round.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-14-TEXT: The target deals bite damage to you.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-15-TEXT: The attack hits you and is a critical hit.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-16-TEXT: You cannot use this attack for 1 round.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-19-TEXT: You become %STATUS-RESTRAINED=restrained% in your gear until you spend an action to free yourself.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-20-TEXT: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-21-TEXT: Your attack hits an ally adjacent to you or the target.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-22-TEXT: You provoke an opportunity attack from all adjacent opponents.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-23-TEXT: You have disadvantage on all attack rolls for 1 round.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-24-TEXT: You take a -2 penalty on attack rolls for 1d6 minutes.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-25-TEXT: Your enemy's armor takes 1d6 %OBJECT-DAMAGE=points of damage%. You take 1d6 points of damage and cannot use that attack for 1d3 rounds.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-26-TEXT: If this was a bite attack, you are %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1d6 rounds.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-27-TEXT: You take 1d4 points of damage and you cannot use this attack %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-28-TEXT: You have disadvantage on ranged attacks, %ABILITY-DEX=Dexterity% checks and are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-29-TEXT: You are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages% (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Str saving throw negates%).
FUMBLE-NATURAL-31-TEXT: You fall %STATUS-UNCONSCIOUS=unconscious% for 1d6 round (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Str saving throw negates%).
FUMBLE-NATURAL-32-TEXT: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-33-TEXT: Your target takes normal damage, you take double damage.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-34-TEXT: The target may attempt to shove (push or knock you prone) or grapple you.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-38-TEXT: Your attack hits an ally within reach and is a critical hit.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-40-TEXT: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-41-TEXT: Your attack deals damage to all targets adjacent to you except the original target.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-42-TEXT: You take a -2 penalty on ability checks and saves for 1d4 hours.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-43-TEXT: You don't threaten adjacenet enemies for 1d6 rounds.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-44-TEXT: Move 10 feet in a random direction provoking opportunity attacks as normal.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-46-TEXT: If this was a claw attack, slam or unarmed strike, you cannot use that attack for 1d6 rounds.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-47-TEXT: Your attack hits, but you are %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 2 rounds (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Str saving throw save% reduces the stun to 1 round).
FUMBLE-NATURAL-48-TEXT: If you had reach greater than 5 feet, it is reduced to 5 feet for 3 rounds.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-49-TEXT: Your target's armor and natural armor bonuses are doubled against you for 3 rounds.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-50-TEXT: You take 1d3 points of damage and your speed is halved %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
FUMBLE-NATURAL-52-TEXT: You are %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Con saving throw negates%).
